channel.title: Simple Hat.. (New Pics)
channel.description:
Just a small hat, that actually turned out decent. (Under 600 faces total btw), I showed to two people on MSN and they actually asked for it? Not planning on releasing so everybody knows.
Pics: [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2qjdbbc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2b89lk.png[/img]

item.title: Simple Hat.. (New Pics)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“h1 sk1ller, post:26, topic:355106”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=451673.msg3314146#msg3314146 date=1282178417]

Lets make it a threesome, there is sub surfing in meta?
Or atleast I think you used meta…

Finally, a 3rd person to see the surfing. The texture, no problem as that happend from the UV mapping. As for the face, that was completely a mistake from re-sizing something. Never noticed it until it was too late
[/quote]

I didn’t know this was even a test, im sorry I don’t spend hours looking at models like you, instead I actually make them… I only know how to Uv map, doesn’t mean I know that there’s a glitch in it, suddenly it means im retarded???[/quote]
You are, as you still have no clue what the problem is. Even after it has been mentioned. Also, this was not men’t to be a known test, that was the point. If i said it was a test, it would have been heavily looked at. I wanted people to ACTUALLY notice something. You don’t need to look at models 24/7 to know the tools around them. Just go, as you will loose this argument.

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Hat.. (New Pics)
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:22, topic:355106”][quote author=Tribbinator link=topic=451673.msg3313889#msg3313889 date=1282166602]

Lets make it a threesome, there is sub surfing in meta?
Or atleast I think you used meta…
[/quote]
Finally, a 3rd person to see the surfing. The texture, no problem as that happend from the UV mapping. As for the face, that was completely a mistake from re-sizing something. Never noticed it until it was too late :P[/quote]

I didn’t know this was even a test, im sorry I don’t spend hours looking at models like you, instead I actually make them… I only know how to Uv map, doesn’t mean I know that there’s a glitch in it, suddenly it means im retarded???

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Hat.. (New Pics)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Tribbinator:

I noticed it right off the bat, haha, I never even knew you could 'surf in meta…odd.

Right click on the object, and you’l see a “patch” thing on the 4th option, over over it and choose the number for different extremes of surfing.

[quote=“reyx7, post:24, topic:355106”]Noooooooo coooon you have to stay this section needs some “veteran” people and you pretty much fill that. Don’t go!!!

And I do like the hat, while rather simple, the texture is sexy.[/quote]
I will still be in the section to look, but that’s it. No more posting models.

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Hat.. (New Pics)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Aah, I don’t have any hats made from velvet, so i just never thought about it. That texture did great though, I’ll get new pics up later, just need to re-do the flaw, and hope someone can notice it in the new one.

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Hat.. (New Pics)
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:18, topic:355106”][quote author=the wanderer link=topic=451673.msg3311486#msg3311486 date=1282005752]
Is the thing that dylan noticed is that the band around the hat isn’t truly a band but instead probably a cylinder? Because the faces keep on going into the model.
[/quote]
100% of the model was made from 1 cylinder (another cylinder for the Band as well -.-). It has the inside of the hat as well, it doesn’t stop at the rim.

@rip4d - I should look for velvet, I dunno why i didn’t think about that. :|[/quote]Because nobody really does. The only reason I thought of it was because your hat looked like one of those black hats with a white band on it, which usually is made of velvet.

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Hat.. (New Pics)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Orngequirrel:

even with 600 faces you could drop it to about 300 or so and have it look the same

Sure, if this was supposed to be added into the RS2 client. How it sits, it works well like it is, and reducing the poly might create some problems of its rendered look.

item.title: Simple Hat.. (New Pics)
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Use the uv mapping tool in metaseq and create a really simple texture with flowers instead of that one that you have right now. It’s kind of blurry and the flowers are distorted. Great structure. Nice overall. I give it a 9/10 if you get better textures.

Read full topic
